mapper.sql: id, uid, xm_id, file_type, file_name, file_path, fabu_type, createTime, updateTime, createName, updateName,auditorState,remarks
mapper.select: SELECT cf., cfa.auditor_id FROM mro_chanpinjiaofu_file cf LEFT JOIN mro_chanpinjiaofu_file_auditor cfa ON cf.id = cfa.chanpinjiaofu_file_id WHERE cf.xm_id = #{xmid} AND cf.file_type = 2 and cfa.objectType=2 AND cf.fabu_type = 2 OR ( cf.uid = #{uid} AND cf.fabu_type = 1 ) ORDER BY cf.id DESC

SELECT cf., cfa.auditor_id FROM mro_chanpinjiaofu_file cf LEFT JOIN mro_chanpinjiaofu_file_auditor cfa ON cf.id = cfa.chanpinjiaofu_file_id WHERE cf.xm_id = #{xmid} AND cf.file_type = 1 and cfa.objectType=2 AND cf.fabu_type = 2 OR ( cf.uid = #{uid} AND cf.fabu_type = 1 ) ORDER BY cf.id DESC
